title.rendered: R. Karras Asset Management and Planning LLC joins MAI Capital Management

content.rendered:
As of December 22, 2023, R. Karras Asset Management and Planning LLC is now a part of MAI Capital Management.

If you are a R. Karras Asset Management and Planning LLC client, you can now reach your advisor team at:

Robert Karras
Senior Wealth Advisor
robert.karras@mai.capital

Tony Carsel
Wealth Specialist
tony.carsel@mai.capital

Anne Sikon
Administrative Assistant
anne.sikon@mai.capital

MAI General Office Phone: 216-920-5144

As a result of our new partnership, R. Karras Asset Management and Planning LLC clients will now have access to:

  • A firm with a 50-year history of taking care of clients, each other, and the community 
  • The backing of an extensive and experienced team
  • Expansive resources to meet your financial needs

 

A note from Rick Buoncore, Managing Partner of MAI Capital Management:

“We are pleased to welcome the R. Karras Asset Management and Planning team to the MAI family. Their commitment to clients makes them a perfect fit for our firm. As MAI continues to expand nationally, adding new and experienced members to the team, we will continue our practice empowering our clients to simplify, protect, and grow their wealth.”

excerpt.rendered: As of December 22, 2023, R. Karras Asset Management and Planning LLC is now a part of MAI Capital Management.
